## CreateDimension

Create a Dimension in the calling app.

### Parameters

-   `name` **[string][73]** 
-   `definition` **[string][73]** 
-   `description` **[string][73]** 
-   `tags` **[string][73]** 
-   `label` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
Without Grouping: CreateDimension(nameField, defField, descField,tagsField)
With Grouping(Hierarchy): CreateDimension(nameField Hierarchy, defListField ,descField,tagsField,labelField)
```

```javascript
Without Grouping :CreateDimension('Country', 'Country',Country of Supplier, 'Sales,Company A')
With Grouping(Hierarchy):CreateDimension('Calendar Date Hierarchy', 'Year,Month,Date' , 'Hierarchy Fiscal Year -> Fiscal Period -> Date', 'Time')
```

Returns **[string][73]** status - "Created" or "Replaced" plus any validation error messages.

## CreateMeasure

Create a Measure in the calling app.

### Parameters

-   `name` **[string][73]** 
-   `definition` **[string][73]** 
-   `description` **[string][73]** 
-   `tags` **[string][73]** 
-   `label` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
CreateMeasure(nameField, defField, descField,tagsField,labelField)
```

```javascript
CreateMeasure('Total Sales', 'Sum(Sales)','Total Sales Aggregation Master Item','KPI,Annual','='Sales extraction date:'& today()')
```

Returns **[string][73]** status - "Created" or "Replaced" plus any validation error messages.

## CreateMeasureFromProperties

Create a Measure in the calling app.

### Parameters

-   `props` **[string][73]** MeasureProps in JSON format

### Examples

```javascript
CreateMeasureFromProperties(measureDefField)
```

Returns **[string][73]** status - "Created" or "Replaced" plus any validation error messages.

## DecodeURI

The decodeURI() function decodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) previously created by encodeURI() or by a similar routine.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
DecodeURI('my%20test.asp?name=st%C3%A5le&car=saab')  // returns 'my test.asp?name=st책le&car=saab'
```

Returns **[string][73]** 

## DecodeURIComponent

The decodeURIComponent() function decodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) component previously created by encodeURIComponent or by a similar routine.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
EncodeURIComponent('https%3A%2F%2Fw3schools.com%2Fmy%20test.asp%3Fname%3Dst%C3%A5le%26car%3Dsaab')  // returns 'https://w3schools.com/my test.asp?name=st책le&car=saab'
```

Returns **[string][73]** 

## Decrypt

Decrypt a value.

### Parameters

-   `ciphertext` **[string][73]** to decrypt, as generated by the Encrypt() function.
-   `passphrase` **[string][73]** to decrypt with.  This must be the same passphrase that was used in Encrypt().

### Examples

```javascript
Decrypt(EncCreditCard, 'secret phrase')
```

Returns **[string][73]** unencrypted text.

## DeleteDimension

Delete a Dimension by proving its name in app the request was executed in.

### Parameters

-   `name` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
DeleteDimension(dimensionName)
```

```javascript
DeleteDimension('Calendar Date')
```

Returns **[string][73]** status - "Deleted" plus any validation error messages.

## DeleteMeasure

Delete a Measure by proving its name in the app request was executed in.

### Parameters

-   `name` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
DeleteMeasure(MeasureName)
```

```javascript
DeleteMeasure('Total Sales')
```

Returns **[string][73]** status - "Deleted" plus any validation error messages.

## EncodeURI

Encodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
EncodeURI('my test.asp?name=st책le&car=saab')  // returns 'my%20test.asp?name=st%C3%A5le&car=saab'
```

Returns **[string][73]** 

## EncodeURIComponent

Encodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) component.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
EncodeURIComponent('my test.asp?name=st책le&car=saab')  // returns 'my%20test.asp?name=st%C3%A5le&car=saab'
```

Returns **[string][73]** 

## Encrypt

Encrypt a value.

### Parameters

-   `plaintext` **[string][73]** to encrypt.
-   `passphrase` **[string][73]** to encrpyt with.

### Examples

```javascript
Encrypt(CreditCard, 'secret phrase')
```

Returns **[string][73]** encrypted text.

## ExampleAggregation

Sample of Aggregation FunctionType. Sums the value of a field, same as Qlik Sum().

### Parameters

-   `fieldname` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
ExampleAggregation(myfield)
```

Returns **[number][74]** 

## ExampleScalar

Sample of Scalar FunctionType. Returns true if num1 GT num2, otherwise false

### Parameters

-   `num1` **[string][73]** 
-   `num2` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
ExampleScalar(field1, field2)
```

Returns **[number][74]** boolean

## ExampleTensor

Sample of Tensor FunctionType. 

<p>Aggregates column2 values by column1 dim values. 
<p>Same as script "LOAD Col1 as Dim, Sum(Col2) as Value FROM .. Group By Col1"

### Parameters

-   `tablename` **tabledescription** {dim, value} - describing two fields, dim being Dimension, value is field to aggregate. See

Returns **table** table with two columns, "Dim", "Value"

## ExtractHtmlText

Extracts text node contents from an HTML string.

### Parameters

-   `htmlString` **[string][73]** 

Returns **[string][73]** text - The text value, which should be the HTML string minus tag elements.

## GetAppLineage

Gets the lineage information of the app.
<br>Current SSE specification requires AppId to be specified as a Field.

### Parameters

-   `Tablename` **tabledescription** {AppId}

### Examples

```javascript
TempId:
LOAD '\Documents\Qlik\Sense\Apps\Sales Discovery.qvf' as AppId
AutoGenerate 1;

LoadedMeasures:
Load * Extension QCB.GetAppLineage(TempId{AppId});
```

Returns **[string][73]** json qLineage(s)

## GetDimensions

Load Dimensions as JSON from an app.
<br>Current SSE specification requires AppId to be specified as a Field.

### Parameters

-   `Tablename` **tabledescription** {AppId}

### Examples

```javascript
TempId:
LOAD '\Documents\Qlik\Sense\Apps\Sales Discovery.qvf' as AppId
AutoGenerate 1;

LoadedDimensions:
Load * Extension QCB.GetDimensions(TempId{AppId});
```

Returns **[string][73]** json Dimension(s)

## GetMeasures

Load Measures as JSON from an app.
<br>Current SSE specification requires AppId to be specified as a Field.

### Parameters

-   `Tablename` **tabledescription** {AppId}

### Examples

```javascript
TempId:
LOAD '\Documents\Qlik\Sense\Apps\Sales Discovery.qvf' as AppId
AutoGenerate 1;

LoadedMeasures:
Load * Extension QCB.GetMeasures(TempId{AppId});
```

Returns **[string][73]** json Measure(s)

## LoadFileToString

Load file contents into a string.

### Parameters

-   `path` **[string][73]** absolute or relative to SSE task

### Examples

```javascript
LoadFileToString('./SupportScript.qvs')
```

Returns **[string][73]** file contents as string

## RegexTest

Tests a string for match with a regular expression.

### Parameters

-   `stringToTest` **[string][73]** The string to test with the regular expression.
-   `pattern` **[string][73]** The regular expression pattern to use in the test.

Returns **[number][74]** boolean - 0 if false, -1 if true.

## Reverse

Reverses the characters in a string.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
Reverse('Hello World')  // returns 'dlroW olleH'
```

Returns **[string][73]** 

## SendMail

Send an email

### Parameters

-   `fromAddress` **[string][73]** 
-   `toAddress` **[string][73]** 
-   `subject` **[string][73]** 
-   `text` **[string][73]** text version of message
-   `html` **[string][73]** html version of message. Empty string if no html version.

### Examples

```javascript
let status = QCB.SendMail('admin@qlikaroo.com', 'someuser@qlikaroo.com', 'Reload Completed',
'Reload of "' & DocumentTitle() & '" completed at ' & Now(1), '');
```

Returns **[string][73]** status

## SortList

Sorts the elements of a string list into alphabetical order. Leading and trailing spaces are removed from the elements. 

<p>A string list is a string where the elements are separated by a common delimiter.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][73]** 
-   `separator` **[string][73]** 

### Examples

```javascript
SortList('John, Zack, Aaron', ',')  // returns 'Aaron,John,Zack'
```

```javascript
SortList('John| Zack| Aaron' '|')  // returns 'Aaron|John|Zack'
```

Returns **[string][73]** text - The text value, which should be the HTML string minus tag elements.

## Space

Replace multiple spaces between words with count spaces.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][73]** 
-   `count` **[number][74]** 

### Examples

```javascript
Space('Sometimes    more than     one', 1)  // returns 'Sometimes more than one'
```

Returns **[string][73]** 

## TransformToString

Transform rows of data to a string using a template. Currently only pug templates supported.

### Parameters

-   `rowdata` **[string][73]** row data
-   `inputFormat` **[string][73]** one of 'csv' or 'json'
-   `template` **[string][73]** name of .pug template, default "HtmlTableSimple.pug"

### Examples

```javascript
Load 
  QCB.TransformToString(rowdata, 'csv', '')
Resident RecentSales;
```

Returns **[string][73]** transformed rows as a single string
